title: Musick's monument, or, A remembrancer of the best practical musick, both divine and civil, that has ever been known to have been in the world divided into three parts ... / by Tho. Mace ...
author: Mace, Thomas, d. 1709?
publisher: Printed by T. Ratcliffe and N. Thompson for the author, and are to be sold by himself ... and by John Carr ...,
